price: Nokorε sε, wͻn a wͻnni Yεn nhyiamu (da) no ho anidaasoͻ, na wͻagye wiase asetena no ato mu, na wͻn akoma atͻ wͻn yεm wͻ ho no, saa nkorͻfoͻ no na wͻn abu wͻn ani agu Yεn nsεnkyerεnee no soͻ no,-
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا وَرَضُواْ بِٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱطۡمَأَنُّواْ بِهَا وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna lā yarjūna liqāanā waraḍū bil-ḥayati al-dun'yā wa-iṭ'ma-annū bihā wa-alladhīna hum ʿan āyātinā ghāfilūna
